Item.Name: ID
Item.Hint: ID number, press LIST key for name/ID search.

Trigger.Name: KEY-LISTVAL
Trigger.TriggerText:
G$_COPY_FLD_ATTR;
:GLOBAL.SECRFRM := 'SOAIDEN';
EXECUTE_TRIGGER('G$_REVOKE_ACCESS');
G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
G$_SECURED_FORM_CALL(:global.current_user,:global.secrfrm,'QUERY');
G$_RESET_GLOBAL;
--
 IF :GLOBAL.VALUE IS NOT NULL THEN
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'LIST_VALUES_COPY' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 END IF ;
--
 G$_CHECK_VALUE ((:KEY_BLOCK.ID IS NULL),
 NULL, TRUE, TRUE);
--
 NEXT_FIELD ;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-VALIDATE-ITEM
Trigger.TriggerText:
/* Move code to POST_CHANGE trigger as part of 4.0 conversion */
NULL;

Trigger.Name: CHECK_KEYS
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 v_gobeacc_exists VARCHAR2(1);
 
 CURSOR gobeacc_exists_cr IS
 SELECT 'Y'
 FROM GOBEACC
 WHERE GOBEACC_PIDM = :PIDM;
 
BEGIN
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (NOT (:PIDM IS NOT NULL
 AND :ID IS NOT NULL),
 '*ERROR* A valid ID must be entered before proceeding.',
 TRUE, TRUE);
 v_gobeacc_exists := 'N';
 OPEN gobeacc_exists_cr;
 FETCH gobeacc_exists_cr INTO v_gobeacc_exists;
 CLOSE gobeacc_exists_cr;
 G$_CHECK_VALUE (v_gobeacc_exists <> 'Y',
 '*ERROR* No GOBEACC record exists for this person.',
 TRUE, TRUE);
END;

Block.Name: GOBEACC
Block.QueryDataSourceName: GOBEACC inner join DBA_USERS on USERNAME = GOBEACC_USERNAME

Graphics.Name: TEXT17
Graphics.GraphicsText: Objects Granted Directly to the User

TextSegment.Name: TEXTSTR19
TextSegment.Text: Objects Granted Directly to the User

ProgramUnit.Name: S$_VALID_ID
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE S$_VALID_ID(ID IN OUT VARCHAR2,
 PIDM IN OUT NUMBER,
 FULL_NAME IN OUT VARCHAR2,
 CONFID_IND IN OUT VARCHAR2,
 DCSD_IND IN OUT VARCHAR2)
IS
 ENTITY_IND VARCHAR2(1);
BEGIN
 CONFID_IND := '';
 DCSD_IND := '';

 
DECLARE
 CURSOR ID_CURSOR IS
 SELECT SPRIDEN_PIDM,
 (SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME || ', ') || SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME || ' ' ||
 DECODE(SPRIDEN_MI,'','',SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_MI,1,1) || '. '),
 SPRIDEN_ENTITY_IND
 FROM SPRIDEN
 WHERE SPRIDEN_ID = ID
 AND SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND IS NULL;
 BEGIN
 OPEN ID_CURSOR ;
 FETCH ID_CURSOR INTO PIDM, FULL_NAME, ENTITY_IND;
 IF ID_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 GOTO CHECK_FOR_PREVIOUS_ID ;
 ELSE
 GOTO CHECK_ENTITY;
 END IF ;
 END ;
--
<< CHECK_FOR_PREVIOUS_ID >>
 DECLARE
 CURSOR PREV_CURSOR IS
 SELECT SPRIDEN_PIDM,
 (SPRIDEN_LAST_NAME || ', ') || SPRIDEN_FIRST_NAME || ' ' ||
 DECODE(SPRIDEN_MI,'','',SUBSTR(SPRIDEN_MI,1,1) || '. '),
 SPRIDEN_ID,
 SPRIDEN_ENTITY_IND
 FROM SPRIDEN
 WHERE SPRIDEN_PIDM IN (
 SELECT SPRIDEN_PIDM
 FROM SPRIDEN
 WHERE SPRIDEN_ID = ID
 AND SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND = 'I' )
 AND SPRIDEN_CHANGE_IND IS NULL;
 BEGIN
 OPEN PREV_CURSOR ;
 FETCH PREV_CURSOR INTO PIDM, FULL_NAME, ID, ENTITY_IND;
 IF PREV_CURSOR%NOTFOUND THEN
 MESSAGE('*ERROR* ID does not exist; press LIST for name/ID search.');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 ELSE
 MESSAGE('*WARNING* Previous ID replaced with current ID.' );
 END IF;
 END ;
--
<<CHECK_ENTITY>>
 IF ENTITY_IND = 'C' THEN
 MESSAGE('*ERROR* ID identifies a company; must enter a person ID.');
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE;
 END IF;
--
<< CHECK_DECEASED >>
 DECLARE
 ALERT_BUT NUMBER;
 CURSOR DCSD_CURSOR IS
 SELECT '*DECEASED*'
 FROM SPBPERS
 WHERE SPBPERS_DEAD_IND = 'Y'
 AND SPBPERS_PIDM = PIDM ;
 BEGIN 
 OPEN DCSD_CURSOR ;
 FETCH DCSD_CURSOR INTO DCSD_IND;
 IF DCSD_CURSOR%FOUND AND
 ID <> :GLOBAL.KEY_IDNO THEN
 ALERT_BUT := G$_DISPLAY_ALERT(
 'S$_CAUTION_ALERT','Warning: This person is deceased.');
 END IF;
 END ;
--
<< CHECK_CONFID >>
 DECLARE
 ALERT_BUT NUMBER;
 CURSOR CONFID_CURSOR IS
 SELECT '*CONFIDENTIAL*'
 FROM SPBPERS
 WHERE SPBPERS_CONFID_IND IS NOT NULL
 AND SPBPERS_PIDM = PIDM ;
 BEGIN
 OPEN CONFID_CURSOR ;
 FETCH CONFID_CURSOR INTO CONFID_IND ;
 IF CONFID_CURSOR%FOUND AND
 ID <> :GLOBAL.KEY_IDNO THEN
 ALERT_BUT := G$_DISPLAY_ALERT('S$_CAUTION_ALERT',
 'Warning: Information about this person is confidential.'); 
 END IF;
 END ;
END;

ProgramUnit.Name: ATVI_AUDIT_TRAIL
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE ATVI_AUDIT_TRAIL IS
/* ************** TVI Audit Trail **************
1. 05-APR-01 SPeterson 
 Created from basline 4.3.3 SHACRSE
2. 01-JUN-01 SPeterson 
 Added gurucls and guruobj blocks.
3. 31-JUL-02 SPeterson
 Converted to Forms6i
4. 03-MAR-06 AMueller 
 Fixed next/prev block sequence to prevent focus from moving into the
 BUTTON_CONTROL_BLOCK, which causes a fatal error message:
 - GOBEACC: Previous Navigation Data Block property set to GURUOBJ
 - Modified GOBEACC.KEY-NXTBLK trigger to query both GURUCLS and GURUOBJ, but
 leave the focus on GURUCLS (the logically "next" data block)
 - GURUOBJ: Next Navigation Data Block property set to GOBEACC
5. 02-MAY-06 ATVIWR#1511 AMueller 
 Added scroll bars to the GURUCLS and GURUOBJ data blocks.
6. 16-FEB-2010 SPeterson 
 Added block for Business Profiles - GORFBPR
*/
BEGIN
 NULL;
END;

Trigger.Name: INVALID_CODE_MSG
Trigger.TriggerText:
MESSAGE(
'*ERROR* Invalid code; press LIST for valid codes.' ) ;
 RAISE FORM_TRIGGER_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: INVALID_FUNCTION_MSG
Trigger.TriggerText:
NULL ;
 MESSAGE( '*ERROR* Invalid function; press SHOW KEYS key' ||
 ' for valid functions.' ) ;

Trigger.Name: GLOBAL_COPY
Trigger.TriggerText:
:KEY_BLOCK.ID := :GLOBAL.KEY_IDNO ;
--
 IF :ID IS NOT NULL THEN
 NEXT_FIELD ;
 PREVIOUS_FIELD ;
 END IF ;
--

Trigger.Name: KEY-CLRFRM
Trigger.TriggerText:
EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'SAVE_KEYS' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER ('ENABLE_KEYS');
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE;
 CLEAR_FORM ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'LOAD_FORM_HEADER' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'GLOBAL_COPY' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;

Trigger.Name: WHEN_NEW_BLOCK_INSTANCE_TRG
Trigger.TriggerText:
IF :CHECK_KEYS = 'Y' THEN
 :CHECK_KEYS := 'N';
 GO_BLOCK ('KEY_BLOCK');
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER( 'CHECK_KEYS' ) ;
 G$_CHECK_FAILURE ;
--
 NEXT_BLOCK ;
 EXECUTE_QUERY ;
 :CHECK_KEYS := 'N';
 EXECUTE_TRIGGER ('DISABLE_KEYS');
END IF;
